Title: Draggable dashboard charts
introduction: You can now easily drag and rearrange dashboard charts to customize their layout just the way you want.

New.description: Added draggable charts to let you rearrange and customize your Dashboard layout.
You can now press Tab to auto-generate commit messages for your prompts.
Added support for uploading and processing PDFs in Playground.
Added the Llama 4 family of models for use.

Improved.description: Improved full-text search in Logs for faster and more accurate results.
Added reasoning capabilities to OpenAI O series models for better analysis.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where Traces were not displaying correctly.
